FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

Unlike most prepaid carriers that deprioritize your data, Vouch Mobile gives you priority access on AT&T's network. You get the same speeds as postpaid customers without the contracts or credit checks.

Absolutely! Switching is easy and you can keep your current phone number. Most customers complete the switch in under 15 minutes.

Your service continues seamlessly with AutoPay enabled. Without AutoPay, you'll receive a reminder before your service expires so you never lose connectivity unexpectedly.

With Vouch Mobile, yes! We don't throttle your speeds or deprioritize your data like traditional prepaid carriers. You get premium service at prepaid prices.

Yes, you can change your plan at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.
